data.title: Reading Challenges
data.meta_description: At Beanstack, we are in the business of motivating people to read more. Through our platform, you can run reading challenges, readathons, and more.
data.text:
Bring the fun back to reading

Ditch Accelerated ReaderÂ® levels, points, and tests in favor of free-choice reading and student autonomy. With reading challenges, students can pick their books, build a diverse reading log, hit big reading goals, and be rewarded for a job well done throughout the school year.

See The Difference

Accountability without compromise

Encourage kids to read without the stress of quizzes or compromising their motivation. By pairing self-accountability through peers with admin features that flag logs or offer quick comprehension checks, Beanstack motivates students to maintain reading log accuracy.

Learn More

Set a community goal

Incentivize readers to contribute to a collective reading goal. It's simple: Readers log double the reading minutes when working toward a community goal.

Run competitions

Use data insights to highlight top readers and engage staff to encourage friendly competition in new challenges. Our most successful partners credit competition as a key driver of success.

Provide recognition and incentives

Amplify our built-in gamification features by rewarding readers. Rewards or prizes double reader participation, confirming that extrinsic motivators lead to an intrinsic love of reading.

Listen to our podcast

Curious about the real people behind your favorite children's and young adult books? Tune into The Reading Culture podcast.

Streamline reading logs and tracking

Transition book clubs and independent reading programs to an online platform that is accessible for all readers from avid to struggling.

Simplify Reading Logs

Supercharge summer reading

Combat the summer slide with the #1 platform libraries use to increase program participation in summer reading challenges and deepen community engagement.

Run Summer Reading

Raise money with reading

Encourage reading, expand your donor base, and raise money for your library or school with an easier and more equitable option than book fairs and physical fundraising drives.

Host a Reading Fundraiser

Gain powerful data and analytics

Track and report on reading progress with real-time data and actionable insights right at your fingertips.

Demonstrate Your Impact
